Kobalt Music Publishing Australia represents worldwide successful Australian musician, actor, comedian and composer Tim Minchin. Minchin wrote the music and lyrics for the award-winning West End and Broadway-bound Matilda The Musical, which recently swept the U.K. 2012 Laurence Olivier Awards winning seven awards including Best New Musical. He’s also been cast in the new season of Showtime’s popular TV series, Californication,where he plays a major recurring role as Atticus Fetch. Best known for his musical comedy act and comedy CD releases, Minchin has had major hits with his popular comedic songs, “If I Didn’t Have You’ (Secret Policeman’s Ball),” “Drowned,” “White Wine in the Sun,” “The Pop Song,” and the infamous “Christmas Song,” which was banned on TV in the U.K. Minchin has also released five DVDs and internationally performs a number of live comedy shows. He also played this year in his dream role of Judas Iscariot  for the sold-out arena tour of Tim Rice and Andrew Lloyd Webber’s musical Jesus Christ Superstar. In August 2013 he’ll be performing in Rosencrantz and Guildenstern Are Dead in Australia at the Sydney Opera House.
